import React from 'react' import cl from './PizzaPopup.module.scss' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { switchVisible } from '../../redux/slices/popupSlice' function PizzaPopup() { const { id, sizes, name, price, imgUrl, types, } = useSelector(state => state.popup.item) const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{name}

) } export default PizzaPopup
